item.description:
It looks like we will get a reprieve from this rain with a storm on Friday, so lets get out at Great Brook on Saturday morning!

Open to all abilities, we break up into groups based on experience/fitness. Bring a picnic lunch if you like!

Be INSIDE the barn by the big door and READY TO SKI by 10:00 AM. Great Brook rents all kinds of gear rental fee $13, trail passes are $12, and it is CASH ONLY * CASH ONLY * CASH ONLY.

Please correspond with each other if you need a ride.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing the Santa hat...

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Great Brook Saturday
